String.string: One Ring to Find Them
The ring of a Shariar is worthless...and priceless. Understand?
Thank you. These brave souls merit honorable treatment.
Speak with {@LinkCreature:418#2001#Baruster} in the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}.
"Of course."
Take Shariar rings off fallen Shariar inside the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}.
Deliver the Shariar rings to {@LinkCreature:418#2001#Baruster} in the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}.
Take Shariar rings off fallen Shariar inside the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}.
Deliver the Shariar rings to {@LinkCreature:418#2001#Baruster} in the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}.
Take Shariar rings off fallen Shariar inside the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}.
Deliver the Shariar rings to {@LinkCreature:418#2001#Baruster} in the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}.
Shariar Rings
Deliver the Shariar rings to {@LinkCreature:78#3007#Agrakh} at {@Rgn:78001$$Zulfikar Fortress}.
"The honor is mine."
